About Wookie

Wookie enables rapid service development in Scala. Wookie can leverage common technologies such as Akka, Kafka, ZooKeeper, and HTTP services. Wookie can also be used as a library with no container. Wookie is YARN enabled.

Project Modules

This project has declared the following modules:

Name Description
Wookie - Core Harness Wookie - Core Harness is the base library that allows the container to run or to be embedded in to other applications. The core load the components and services defined through configuration or auto-discovery.
Wookie - Test Harness Wookie - Test Harness is the base test framework for Wookie that allows easy integration test validation and single node functionality.
Wookie - Archetype: Service Wookie enables rapid service development in Scala. Wookie can leverage common technologies such as Akka, Kafka, ZooKeeper, and HTTP services. Wookie can also be used as a library with no container. Wookie is YARN enabled.
Wookie - Archetype: Component Wookie enables rapid service development in Scala. Wookie can leverage common technologies such as Akka, Kafka, ZooKeeper, and HTTP services. Wookie can also be used as a library with no container. Wookie is YARN enabled.
